full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Title (English)
Catenary Lighting Upgrade to LED - Mission Medium Institution, Mission, BC

#### Title (French)
Modernisation de l’éclairage à DEL – Établissement de Mission à sécurité moyenne, Mission (C.-B.)

#### Reference and Solicitation Number
WS4244131424 - DophonumenEB422111177CP - 1
WS4244131424

#### Date of Publication and Tender Notification ##
**Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-20, 14:00:00

#### Notice Details

* The tender is being issued to procure the services of a contractor to upgrade and replace the existing catenary lighting system at the Mission Medium Institution located in Mission, BC. The project includes the installation of new LED luminaries.
* The procurement is a two-phase selection process, with Phase One evaluating qualifications followed by Phase Two where the shortlisted contractor will provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings.
* The bid outcomes will be documented and can be obtained upon request.
* The estimated cost of the project ranges between $100,001 and $500,000.

#### Project Details

* **Project Location**: Mission Medium Institution, 8751 Stave Lake Street, Mission, BC
* **Project Description**: Replacement of the existing catenary lighting system with new LED luminaries and maintenance or repair services.
* **Deliverables**: The contractor is required to complete the project within 20 weeks of contract award notification.

#### Quotation Requirements

* The contractor should be qualified to carry out specialized trade construction and maintenance services, electrical system services, and lighting system maintenance or repair services.

#### Contact Information

* Name: Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
